algorithm_technique: Dynamic programming with combinatorics for permutations
problem_summary_simple: Count distinct permutations of a digit string where even and odd indexed sums are equal.
problem_summary_technical: Uses DP to count ways to form sums for even/odd positions, combined with multinomial coefficients for permutations.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into distributing digits to even and odd positions.
Combinatorics (nCr) is essential to account for identical digits.
DP state needs to track current sum and number of digits placed in even positions.
